sentences.en: Paid 15 to Grama, six went back to the Chesterfield.
sentences.cn: 给格兰玛一万五, 6000给切斯特非尔德.

sentences.en: The Vedic grama could have a pur, or a fort - like structure within it.
sentences.cn: 吠陀的加玛会咕噜咕噜地叫, 或者有城堡般的建筑在里面.

trans.tran_cn: 美国西部产的一种牧草
trans.tran_en: any of various grasses of the genus Bouteloua, of W North America and South America: often used as pasture grasses
